document_data.caption: An astrolabe (left) and [[armillary sphere]] (right).
document_data.name: Astrolabe
document_data.mainbody: '''Astrolabes''' were scientific items in the Realms often used by [[wizard]]s during astrological experiments to track the movements of celestial bodies.
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 8 [[gold piece]]s.
document_data.Notable Astrolabes: * ''[[Astrolabe of entrapment]]'', a variety of astrolabes in [[Zakhara]] that could imprison [[genie]]s.
